pages.text: The $(item)Sigil of Hydration$(), when enabled, will use $(thing)LP$() from a player's $(thing)Soul Network$() to hydrate the player.$(br2)This sigil will apply its effect for as long as it is active, ensuring the player is always fully hydrated.

pages.title: Sigil of Temp. Lands
pages.text: The $(item)Sigil of Temperate Lands$(), when enabled, will use $(thing)LP$() from a player's $(thing)Soul Network$() to regulate the body temperature of the player.

pages.title: Ritual of the S. Hearth
pages.text: The $(item)Ritual of the Soothing Hearth$() is a $(thing)LP$() powered ritual that regulates the body temperature of all players in a large area.
